page.title: 13MR.D.BALFE,GOLLANFIELD
page.content: { MR.BALFE}writes{music}under the name of{Rod McQueen.}He has had some very popular hits in{pop music. His {career}started when he was very young.{Mr.Balfe}lived in{Paris and toured{France}and{Germany }from{ {1963}to{1967}during which he was {singing}and{playing bass}with a group called{"The Sound Casters." In one of the sessions Rod met up with{Daniel Boone.}Their partnership in{song writing}has been very successful from then. { Mr. Balfe}owns the only{recording {studio}in Scotland and it is one of only five in Britain.It is at {Flemington House. { }Mr Balfe likes living in the Highland mansion because it's quiet and he can do all his work in peace.Sometimes however he lives at his cottage near London.
